fullMessage:
Robots are everywhere: from drones and NPCs to automated workflows and AI agents. They live in hardware, in code, and in culture. It's a world that deserves its own identity. Enter .robot, our latest Web3-only TLD.

Built with 0G Foundation, .robot is the naming layer for the robotics spectrum â€” from cobots and automation to humanoids and gaming bots. The future is accelerating fast: cobots growing 32% YoY by 2030, AI making robots smarter by 2025, and experts predicting humanoids will soon reshape logistics and manufacturing.

The .robot pre-sale is live now, with minting beginning on 0G blockchain in Q1 2026.
